installCommand: curl https://sh.rustup.rs -sSf | sh -s -- -y --profile minimal && $HOME/.cargo/bin/rustup target add wasm32-unknown-unknown && $HOME/.cargo/bin/cargo install wasm-pack && npm install
buildCommand: export PATH="$HOME/.cargo/bin:$PATH" && (cd ../crates/fork_wasm && wasm-pack build --target web --out-dir pkg-web) && npm run build
